SEARCH

Class ContactsUI

java.lang.Object
ContactsUI
public final class ContactsUI extends Object
ContactsUI class contains the CLI UI of the app. Class contains three methods to put everything pasted in the CLI inside the more easy to look-at borders.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • mainUI

      public static void mainUI()
      This method contains the basic UI of the Contacts App. Simply printing it to the CLI in the given form for the ContactsApp class to use.

    • contactVariants

      public static void contactVariants()
      Method contains process of printing a list of all contacts. Method prints contacts placeholder and full name (last name + first name) and does that in easy to look-at borders. First it defines the longest string that can be inside the borders. Then prints the borders and needed data with using pasteSpaces()-method to get enough spaces afterwards.

    • dataVariants

      public static void dataVariants(int choice1)
      Method contains process of printing a list of all data of one contact. Method prints contacts data and does that in easy to look-at borders. First it defines the longest string that can be inside the borders. The pattern has "x" corresponding the number of data it takes. Also "longest" -int gets +10 to its value. That happens because of the longest possible pattern, which is CASE 2 ("First name"). Then prints the borders and needed data using for-loop and switch-case and using pasteSpaces() -method to get enough spaces afterwards.
      Parameters:
      choice1 - choice1 made in the updateContact() method.

    • pasteSpaces

      public static String pasteSpaces(String toCompare, int longest)
      Method contains the process of giving String of spaces of needed quantity. Method gives the maximum value of spaces in integer-longest and the String-toCompare to define needed spaces for this particular String. First it calculates needed spaces by substracting toCompare-length from longest and then goes through simple for-loop inserting spaces to the toReturn-String.
      Parameters:
      toCompare - String which length will be compared to the longest to define the needed amount of spaces.
      longest - value of the maximum amount of spaces.
      Returns:
      toReturn String containing of spaces.
